subject: Desk of Mr. Kenneth Yakubu
body:
Desk of Mr. Kenneth Yakubu  
Director, United Bank for Africa Plc (UBA)  
Our Ref: UBA/Nig/12/2023                               
                         Your Payment Valued US$10.5M  
Attention: Beneficiary,  
My Name is Mr. Kenneth Yakubu the Director ATM Department, United Bank For Africa (UBA). This is to inform you that your ATM MASTER CARD is valued at $10.5M (Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars) as part of United Nation Compensation Funds in conjunction with the Nigeria Federal Ministry of Finance and United Bank For Africa(UBA). We have been instructed by the United Nations to deliver the package to you without any further delay.  
The pin code and instructions on how to use the card will be sent to you so when you get your parcel you will open it and then all other information is there to assist you to start making use of the card in any ATM MACHINE near you. Meanwhile I want to notify you that the insurance fee of your package has been paid by our bank. The only thing remaining right now is the delivery fee of $95 as the Authorities have Authorized before your package will be delivered to you.  
However the tracking number of your package will be issued to you as soon as we receive the delivery fee from you, so request for information where you will make the payment of $95 for your delivery fee to enable us deliver your ATM CARD to your address.  
You are hereby advised to stop any form of communication with every other person if you have been in contact with any, also remember that all you will ever have to spend is $95 nothing more. We are also guaranteeing that your ATM CARD will be successfully delivered to you before the next 48hrs after confirmation receipt of the fee of $95.  
Everything has been taken care of, including Taxes, Custom Paper and Clearance Duty.  
Please kindly reconfirm the following details below to avoid any wrong delivery.  
1. Your Full Name:  
2. Delivery Address:  
3. Your direct Cell/Whatsapp Number:  
4. A copy of your ID:  
5. Your Nearest Airport:  
6. Occupation……………………………  
Be advised that I will send you the copy of your ATM MASTER CARD, my ID and  your Statement of Account for $10.5M from United Bank for Africa (UBA) as proof of your funds as soon as we receive your positive response.  
Get back to me on my private email 
kennethyakubu47@gmail.com
 
Awaiting  your immediate response.  
Yours faithfully,  
Mr. Kenneth Yakubu  
Director ATM Department  
United Bank for Africa Plc (UBA)

subject: Re:   Desk of Mr. Kenneth Yakubu
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth Yakubu,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting news! I must say, it's not every day that one receives an email about a substantial sum of money. 

I'm curious though, how did my name come up in relation to this ATM Master Card? And could you please explain more about the United Nations' involvement in this? It's all very intriguing.

Also, I'm wondering if there are any other ways to cover the delivery fee? Is it possible for it to be deducted from the card itself?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Betty
